programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune S5
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrities to solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to $1 million. All of the money won goes to a charity of their choice.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan helps fight off a raid by the Sultan’s men, but is captured when Lang betrays him. Marianne, back in civilized life and courted by Brooke, struggles with doubts about what Sandokan told her, breaking down as the Sultan parades the tortured pirate in Labuan and she realises her father’s guilt as a war criminal. Meanwhile, the Sultan exposes Brooke’s biracial identity, disgracing him. Determined to redeem himself, Brooke proposes a mysterious plan to Marianne. Soon after, Sandokan is found dead in his cell.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan survives a fake poison, part of Brooke’s pact with Marianne: her hand for Sandokan’s freedom. Brooke hopes Sandokan will overthrow the Sultan, leaving room for him. Indeed, Sandokan returns to the jungle, leading the Dayaks’ to free the slaves. Brooke strikes a deal with Guillonk to suppress the revolt in exchange for becoming Rajah. When Marianne learns of this, she escapes and warns Sandokan. The Sultan is killed, Brooke rules Sarawak, but the Dayaks are free. Marianne and Sandokan begin a new life as revolutionaries on the hidden island of Mompracem.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. programme.desc: Now broken out of mind control, Layla goes undercover with the gang, hiding the fact that she’s no longer being controlled. Rafaela puts Layla’s driving to the test in a wild race against a mystery driver, then takes the rest of the crew hostage just days before Rafaela's dastardly plot.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers

Echo makes it into the jungle and must battle a mind-controlled Ms. Nowhere using everything she’s learned about spying and survival from the very woman who's out to get her. Meanwhile, Rafaela enlists Frostee to help her develop a non-exploding version of the mind control formula before her plan goes into motion at the favela race.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers

Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: The Paladins attempt to uncover Honerva’s plans by returning to Olkarion. They get more than they bargained for when a Weblum targets the planet as its next meal.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: While Pod 4 cleans the cafeteria after school as punishment for causing a ruckus in class, Liam shares the legend of Crazy Eddy Meyer, a former janitor who went insane and lurks the halls at Cosmos High every Friday the 13th. Skeptical at first, the podmates' bravado begins to erode when they find themselves locked inside the school on a stormy Friday the 13th. The group splits to traverse the spooky terrain of the empty school looking for an exit, as their escalating fear of Crazy Eddy is played out against the background of each of their own secret fears.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Although it looks like a class treasure hunt, it's really all about cooperation. To push this point, Mr. Towes appoints Liam to lead the group. Problem is, everyone has their own idea of how to succeed.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Raffi's admission of vegetarianism has Birch immediately jumping on the flesh-free diet bandwagon. Eventually she gives into temptation sinking her teeth into a burger as Sandra clicks her photo that becomes the winning entry in a burger chain's “Teen of the Month” contest. In an effort to hold Raffi's attention, Birch tries in vain to suppress her hypocrisy and the fast food advertising that expose her meat-eating ways.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: A falling out between Raffi and Liam puts Birch in an awkward position. Fed up with the impact the boys fight is having on her life, she recruits Sandra to help her give them a dose of their own medicine. Meanwhile Sandra is busy doing her own recruiting, looking for volunteers who wouldn't mine “laying down on the job” to help her win the Citywide Skateboard Jumpathon.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All the tots are picking fruit so Poppy can use it to make her famous ice cream. Stingo thinks he has come up with a much better plan to get hold of some ice cream without having to pick anything… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the “arms of the law”.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers

Tony’s awesome driving impresses Shashi Dhar (the head of SH1FT3R and the person Ms. Nowhere wants them to investigate), and after Tony and his crew pull a heist on a big rig full of energy drinks for Shashi, they’re officially accepted into the circuit.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: 17-year-old Tony Toretto and his gang are psyched when Dom recommends them to Ms. Nowhere for a spy racing job. Excited to get the opportunity to live up to Dom’s legacy, they use their street smarts and driving skills to infiltrate a race with SH1FT3R, a high-octane racing circuit whose drivers are all under 20.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony goes head-to-head with SH1FT3R’s main recruiter Layla Gray in a death-defying spy race through LA Tunnels, parking lots and construction sites. Tony’s awesome driving impresses Shashi Dhar (the head of SH1FT3R and the person Ms. Nowhere wants them to investigate), and after Tony and his crew pull a heist on a big rig full of energy drinks for Shashi, they’re officially accepted into the circuit.

programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: V&A curators uncover untold stories in objects, featuring African fashion, a kente cloth, a James Barnor photograph, and a puzzling 'Ancient Persian' dish.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: This week, "Secrets of the Museum" spotlights industry and design. Curator Martin preps a Maurice Broomfield photo exhibit, while Jenny receives a rare Biba production file. Also featured: a jamdani stole and Josiah Wedgwood's pottery trials.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: This week, conservator Adriana cleans a Donatello sculpture, Simon receives Helen Mirren's costume from "The Audience," Christopher meets designer Sir Kenneth Grange, and V&A Dundee recruits artist Yinka Ilori for a colorful maze.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Spike Lee has always been a controversial and political filmmaker whose films speak for themselves. Over 40 years since his debut in the world of film, Spike continues to push boundaries in America.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: 60 years since his directorial debut, Martin Scorsese's life has been dedicated to the past, present and future of cinema. Named Caretaker of Cinema, Martin Scorsese continues to push the boundaries of moviemaking.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota hunt for Britain’s great warrior Queen: Boudica. Mary-Ann predicts the future with a giant rabbit, while Clive rides a war chariot and peers into some entrails to discover that overthrowing the Romans was truly revolting.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota test outrageous remedies like leeches, head-drilling, and a pigeon that cures the plague. Also, Henry VIII’s role in Tudor medicine.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota investigate one of Britain’s sinister mysteries: decapitated bodies in gruesome poses, warrior kings with tiny heads… and killer cake.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive and Mary-Ann investigate 34,000 years of Britain’s Gods and Monsters. The intrepid duo hunt for King Arthur, uncover the gates of hell, and decipher some very rude ancient graffiti in search of answers to Britain’s most mystic mysteries.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Innsbruck, the twins whisk Haley to an alpine wonderland of skiing, bobsledding, après-ski drinks, and a magical trip down childhood stardom—plus a touch of witchcraft!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Ireland, the twins join Evanna and her family for hurling matches, traditional dance, Potter nostalgia, and a spine-tingling countryside adventure!

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary Ann Ochota explore a mysterious giant hill figure and get drawn into ancient myths, local folklore, and pagan rituals. Who put it there and why?

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Were Druids prehistoric hippies or bloodthirsty practitioners of human sacrifice? To find out, Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota explore Anglesey, consider cannibalism, and face the fiery Wicker Man.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota seek the legendary British king. Clive meets a real Merlin and tries to wield Excalibur, while Mary-Ann sits at the Round Table and searches for Arthur’s final resting place to discover the truth behind the legend.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now broken out of mind control, Layla goes undercover with the gang, hiding the fact that she’s no longer being controlled. The crew is shocked to discover that revered martyr Rafaela Moreno is still alive and is the mastermind behind the mind control plot. Rafaela puts Layla’s driving to the test in a wild race against a mystery driver, then takes the rest of the crew hostage just days before Rafaela's dastardly plot.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now in Rafaela’s custody, the crew works together to break Echo out to retrieve the hauler. Echo makes it into the jungle and must battle a mind-controlled Ms. Nowhere using everything she’s learned about spying and survival from the very woman who's out to get her. Meanwhile, Rafaela enlists Frostee to help her develop a non-exploding version of the mind control formula before her plan goes into motion at the favela race.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Echo and Ms. Nowhere bust Cisco, Frostee, and Gary out of their cell. But Rafaela has already mind controlled Tony and Layla and taken them to drive for her in the favela race, allowing her to release her mind control formula on the crowd!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim yearns to save Claires brother Meanwhile Strickler takes a field trip to find help in his quest for power

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim is nominated for Spring Fling King Meanwhile Strickler brings Angor Rot to Arcadia so the Troll assassin can meet his prey.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: The Paladins attempt to uncover Honerva’s plans by returning to Olkarion. They get more than they bargained for when a Weblum targets the planet as its next meal.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: While Pod 4 cleans the cafeteria after school as punishment for causing a ruckus in class, Liam shares the legend of Crazy Eddy Meyer, a former janitor who went insane and lurks the halls at Cosmos High every Friday the 13th. Skeptical at first, the podmates' bravado begins to erode when they find themselves locked inside the school on a stormy Friday the 13th. The group splits to traverse the spooky terrain of the empty school looking for an exit, as their escalating fear of Crazy Eddy is played out against the background of each of their own secret fears.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Although it looks like a class treasure hunt, it's really all about cooperation. To push this point, Mr. Towes appoints Liam to lead the group. Problem is, everyone has their own idea of how to succeed.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Raffi's admission of vegetarianism has Birch immediately jumping on the flesh-free diet bandwagon. Eventually she gives into temptation sinking her teeth into a burger as Sandra clicks her photo that becomes the winning entry in a burger chain's “Teen of the Month” contest. In an effort to hold Raffi's attention, Birch tries in vain to suppress her hypocrisy and the fast food advertising that expose her meat-eating ways.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: A falling out between Raffi and Liam puts Birch in an awkward position. Fed up with the impact the boys fight is having on her life, she recruits Sandra to help her give them a dose of their own medicine. Meanwhile Sandra is busy doing her own recruiting, looking for volunteers who wouldn't mine “laying down on the job” to help her win the Citywide Skateboard Jumpathon.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has composed a song for Violet but is upset when the twins break her guitar. How will she sing for Violet now? Could the twins have the answer…

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All the tots are picking fruit so Poppy can use it to make her famous ice cream. Stingo thinks he has come up with a much better plan to get hold of some ice cream without having to pick anything… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Olivia

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia 1

Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks 1
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4
programme.desc: Join Ryan and his team as they continue the mammoth trek that began in Vaduz, Liechtenstein, meeting a fascinating collection of characters along their path, as they draw ever closer to their goal of arriving in Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific 2
programme.desc: Martin explores the Philippines, from Manila's jeepneys and bamboo bikes, Catholic fiestas and family feasts, to remote tribal burials, rice god rituals, meeting chocolate heroes, shamans and witches, to spotting cuddly tarsiers and pulsing fireflies.

programme.title: Deadly 60 6
programme.desc: Steve Backshall dives into the world of the caiman, learns about the plight of the world's biggest parrot and tries to find his nemesis - the giant river otter.

programme.title: Deadly 60 6
programme.desc: Steve Backshall heads to a place very few people ever go: Snake Island in Brazil, where the concentration of snakes is higher than anywhere else on earth.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks 1
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia 1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories 1
programme.desc: Starting in the busy container port and tea centre of Dubai, a tea hub where millions of tonnes of tea are traded from east to west, we move in Fujian Province to witness the beautiful natural withering process of White Tea, increasing in popularity in China and around the world.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5
programme.desc: In the fifth season, Diane is forced to question whether it’s appropriate for her to help run an African American law firm with Liz when the firm loses two top lawyers. programme.title: The Good Fight S5

programme.title: Jack Taylor: Shot Down
programme.desc: His assistant in gun related coma, guilt stricken private investigator Jack Taylor leaves Galway for Dublin where he helps a young girl whose mother has been murdered.

programme.title: Accused S2
programme.desc: Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Iron Squad W

Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Twelve MasterChef contestants are met by a bust of judge Jean-Christophe Novelli, made entirely of butter. Fighting for their place in the competition, they must create a dish celebrating butter.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael cooks up her family's favourite version of spaghetti and meatballs with a Tuscan flair.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips
programme.desc: James and his team connect with Tyler, an aspiring flipper with a lead on a zombie house. But entrusting such a big job to a partner with little experience makes them question whether he can do it.

programme.desc: Pantoh is a Taiwanese dining experience where guests enjoy exquisite dishes in open-air venues. Chef Ah-yong showcases an emblematic dish of pantoh cuisine: calamari, sea snail, and leek soup.

programme.title: Enlighten Your Life (S3)
programme.desc: Today's homes will focus on "Home Interiors for Families," reflecting the rising popularity of family-orientated designs. We'll be sharing many tips that bring small but certain happiness to your home.

programme.desc: What is red, white and green all over? It's Rachael Ray's lasagne! Rachael shows how to make delicious lasagne by layering sheets of pasta with cime di rapa, ricotta and a ragu sauce.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Impress your holiday guests with a classic cheesy fondue party! Rachael shows how to make her version of an easy and decadent "Fundue" that is sure to bring everyone around to celebrate the holidays.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: In 1587, a group of settlers land off the coast of North Carolina on Roanoke Island to establish the first English Colony in America. But only a few years later, the 115 men, women and children vanish.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: A cartoon studio creates one of the most recognisable characters in the world. Mickey Mouse begins as a pencil sketch, and through a journey of failure, innovation, and guts becomes an American icon.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: Will Chum strike a deal with a signed Cy Young photo, can Rick step into the ring and take a shot on a famous Muhammad Ali artefact or does Corey slide into home with a vintage bat or let it walk on by?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in search of a metal object buried in the Mesa, they also perform a new experiment at the Triangle that causes startling UFOs to appear on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: It's one of the most famous prehistoric monuments on Earth. A mysterious arrangement of stones that have adorned the English countryside for millennia. But nobody knows how the landmark was built or why.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)
programme.desc: For millennia, plagues, curses, and the violent destruction of cities have been blamed on the wrath of gods. But were these divine punishments mere myth, or is there proof they are based on real events?

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S5)
programme.desc: In 1698, Captain Kidd raids a ship on the high seas and seizes its treasure... but Kidd is hanged before revealing where he stashed it. What happened to Captain Kidd's lost booty... and where is it now?

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: With time running out, the team returns to Le Chameau for another attempt at its elusive stern. When a series of finds threatens to upend their plan, the team must make one final push.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the competition continues to drain the survivalists, they soon face a reckoning with the strategies they've implemented. All of them seem to be teetering over the edge.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: When a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates, two best friends who'd do anything for each other find themselves in a no-holds-barred, take-no-prisoners struggle that threatens to erupt into all-out war.

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: A widower's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

programme.title: Robocop 3
programme.desc: A multinational company is determined to evacuate the city of Detroit to build their pet project called Delta City. RoboCop must fight the mega corporation and help the people of Detroit.

programme.title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone and Estelle Getty star in this action comedy about a detective whose life is turned upside down when his feisty mother witnesses a murder and becomes his unlikely partner.

programme.title: Myanmar Docu
programme.desc: In 2021, Myanmar’s military staged a sudden coup, shattering a decade of democratic progress. As leaders were detained, citizens from all walks of life rose in unprecedented protest. Through raw footage captured by those still trapped inside the country, this documentary reveals what daily life has been like over the past five years under military rulefamilies displaced, voices silenced, and communities surviving on resilience.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Troubled teen Alyssa Bustamante was a self-styled 'bad girl' who said she wanted to know how it felt to kill. She gave in to this curiosity and murdered her nine-year-old neighbour Elizabeth Olten.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When Linda Slaten is brutally strangled in her Lakeland, FL, home, a web of suspects emerges. The case takes a dramatic turn when a DNA hit exposes the sinister underbelly of this peaceful community.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: Local police receive a distressing 911 call from 32-year-old Brian Redding. He is heard crying and screaming that he has found his 16-year-old girlfriend dead in their room.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When Betty Jones, 65, and Kathryn Crigler, 81, are brutally attacked in a 1990 home invasion, the tiny community of Starkville, MS, is left living in fear.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A man brutally attacks multiple people during an auto store robbery. A woman with an unusual weapon fends off an alleged serial thief. A woman is carjacked by a wanted fugitive and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Aaron Campbell didn't admit his crimes until after his conviction. He abducted six-year-old neighbour Alesha MacPhailand, carried her to a nearby wood, and raped and murdered her.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: In 2006, Ken Juedes was found dead by his wife, Cindy Shulz-Juedes. For 13 years the case went cold until investigators linked her to the murder.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: In Epping, New Hampshire, Sheila LaBarre was known as an eccentric widow who loved her rabbits. But her turbulent childhood, a coma-induced vision, and her husband's death sent Sheila on a mission to kill.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Pta
programme.desc: Parent-Teacher Activity Time A helpful guide for parents and teachers, this program features essential topics to better support children in the distance learning setup.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at kumuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Understand the nature of solid figures, sequences in forming rules, expressions and equations. Learn more about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to present reports of differing viewpoints and how to evaluate narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano unawain at pahalagahan ang pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about gravity, friction and how they affect movement of objects, alongside how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at kumuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Understand the nature of solid figures, sequences in forming rules, expressions and equations. Learn more about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to present reports of differing viewpoints and how to evaluate narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano unawain at pahalagahan ang pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about gravity, friction and how they affect movement of objects, alongside how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the natural and physical environment and one’s culture and heritage

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: June 1944. The Allied landing is imminent and all the villagers are waiting for it impatiently. Everyday life continues despite this unbearable suspense. Of course, nothing will go smoothly.

programme.title: L'Avenir Nous Appartient
programme.desc: Foster care: a centre where youngsters can stay on even after reaching adulthood; the how and why of recycling hairdressing waste; using philosophy to help primary school children develop critical thinking; encouraging adults to debate on Twitter with respect.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Laïcite, L'Exception Francaise - 120 Ans, Et Maintenant ?
programme.desc: The 1905 law proclaiming the separation of Church and State is 120 years old. Affirming freedom of conscience and religious freedom, it is considered to be the founding text of secularism. Today, secularism is the subject of controversy and debate. But what exactly does it mean?

programme.title: Auschwitz, Des Survivants Racontent
programme.desc: Deportees from all over occupied Europe arrive at Auschwitz. It's the discovery of the Nazi concentration camp universe: brutal forced labour, daily violence, hunger, thirst, disease and omnipresent death. Everyone has to figure out how to survive in this industrial killing centre.

programme.title: Auschwitz, Des Survivants Racontent
programme.desc: The deportees from the Auschwitz concentration camp become the rare witnesses to mass extermination. Forty-four survivors tell their own stories and the stories of those who never left. From this multitude of individual stories emerges a picture of an industrial killing centre.

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Chine, Les Grands Maitres De L'Art
programme.desc: Che Peng Fei sublimates traditional Chinese painting by charging it with a unique poetic sensibility. His art, inspired by nature and philosophy, evokes a rich, contemplative inner world.

programme.title: Pistes Vertes
programme.desc: In the industrial world, the idea of reuse is gaining ground. A business owner in Orne has started reconditioning servomotors.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Mission Info
programme.desc: News programme aimed at 7 to 11-year-olds! Each episode, devised for children and their parents, provides insight accessible to younger ones, combined with explanations, immersive reports and expert interviews. An educational quiz also gives children the chance to test their knowledge in a fun way.

programme.title: Ma Vie Avec L'Ia
programme.desc: Theo, a teenager, directly questions artificial intelligence in an attempt to better understand it. He seeks to know what constitutes it, what feeds it, and how it analyzes data.

programme.title: Carbone
programme.desc: Benoit Poiraudeau is fighting climate change by planting trees, but without asking for permission. He's a clandestine planter.

programme.title: Falo
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falo'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel-Landschaft, we visit the home of a couple of tattoo artists, a house covered in ivy and with a very stylish interior! The tour continues in a former school that has been converted into a home. The owner, Ursula, has turned her house into a sort of junk shop...

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Wedded by force in Kabylia, Dalila came to Paris very young, forced to follow her husband. Between violence and financial hardship, she found the strength to free herself and try her hand at a traditionally male profession: taxi driver. She explains her struggle to take her future in hand again.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: He is part of the long list of Auvergnats who ''moved up to the capital.'' But chef David Rathgeber preferred the kitchens of great chefs to the bougnats' cellars. Under Alain Ducasse's guidance, he followed his star, and now delights Parisian palates.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Dans Les Bottes De Lucky Luke
programme.desc: For the naive reader, the Far-West is a plain, the sky, a horse and a cowboy. Lucky Luke is himself alone the symbol of this legendary character, a mythical horseman, driving forward immense herds of cattle, alone in boundless nature. Jul follows in his footsteps.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 4
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.)

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 10
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 54
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 199
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 11
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 8
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 5

programme.title: Cuerpo Y Alma ep 2
programme.desc: Maya, a young nurse who has been having terrifying nightmares finds out a horrifying truth about a debt that was made to save her life when she was a child. As she's about to find out, the payment just may cost her much more than her life.

programme.title: Carpool ep 1
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 7
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.
